name: Kenku
languages: understands Auran and Common but speaks only through the use of its Mimicry trait

abilities.name: Ambusher.
abilities.description: In the first round of a combat, the kenku has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it surprised

abilities.name: Mimicry.
abilities.description: The kenku can mimic any sounds it has heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 14 Wisdom (Insight) check.
